spec_data.Name: eclipse-ptp-pldt-upc
spec_data.Description:
Adds a range of static analysis and programming assistance tools for UPC.
Note: this is separated from the rest of PLDT since it requires the UPC
feature of CDT, which is sometimes not installed with CDT.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 21 Sep 2017 12:49:18 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: PTP Parallel Language Development Tools UPC Support
